Package ohos.media.common

Class AVMetadata

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.media.common.AVMetadata
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Sequenceable

    public final class AVMetadata
extends Object
implements Sequenceable
    Represents media metadata, which is used for media data display.

    You can use this class to obtain metadata information about a media item.

    Since:
    3
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Multimedia#MEDIA

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static interface  AVMetadata.AVLongKey
      Enumerates the keys for long values in the media metadata.
      static interface  AVMetadata.AVPixelMapKey
      Enumerates the keys for PixelMap values in the media metadata.
      static interface  AVMetadata.AVTextKey
      Enumerates the keys for text values in the media metadata.
      static class  AVMetadata.Builder
      Builder class used to create AVMetadata objects.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface ohos.utils.Sequenceable

        Sequenceable.Producer<T>

    • Method Detail

      • hasKey

        public boolean hasKey​(String key)
        Checks whether the specified key is contained in the media metadata.
        Parameters:
        key - Indicates the key.
        Returns:
        Returns true if it exists; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        3

      • getText

        public CharSequence getText​(String key)
        Obtains the CharSequence value of the specified key in the media metadata.
        Parameters:
        key - Indicates the key, which can be one defined in AVMetadata.AVTextKey or a custom key you have defined.
        Returns:
        Returns the value of the specified key if obtained; returns null if the key does not exist.
        Since:
        3

      • getString

        public String getString​(String key)
        Obtains the string value of the specified key in the media metadata.
        Parameters:
        key - Indicates the key, which can be one defined in AVMetadata.AVTextKey or a custom key you have defined.
        Returns:
        Returns the value of the specified key if obtained; returns null if the key does not exist.
        Since:
        3

      • getLong

        public long getLong​(String key)
        Obtains the long value of the specified key in the media metadata.
        Parameters:
        key - Indicates the key, which can be one defined in AVMetadata.AVLongKey or a custom key you have defined.
        Returns:
        Returns the value of the specified key if obtained; returns 0L if the key does not exist.
        Since:
        3

      • getKeysSet

        public Set<String> getKeysSet​()
        Obtains a set of available string keys contained in the media metadata.
        Returns:
        Returns the string key set.
        Since:
